review.title: “Office Coordinator”
review.pros: Pros – The company has generous benefits to employees, flexible, strong family oriented culture, fun work environment. Human Resources has an open door policy, managers are open minded and willing to listen. Everyone has a positive attitude and everyone gets along. Company continues to grown in the industry. Smart and driven colleges. Company encourages employee ideas for new products.
review.cons: Cons – Building is becoming to small based on company growth.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company

review.title: “Mangement disingenuous”
review.pros: Pros – Good introduction to the toy industry, they go to many tradeshows where you can make numerous connections. easy sale, but you need to sell a bunch.
review.cons: Cons – High quotas, no reccognition for efforts as they feel that the product sales it self . Management is two faced, they describe and show themselves as a soft high end company but they are very cut throat with employees.
